attributes.action: Enforce the 50mph lorry speed limit on dual carrigeways, to free up the overtaking lane.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have a very poor network of trunk roads. Overtaking lorries are a major cause of frustration to other road users. Specs speed cameras are urgently needed on all our busy trunk roads, to stop this ever increasing nuisance of lorry trying to overtake lorry. Congestion is going to  get worse, why not free up those lanes? It works in Europe.
